other_tests.findings: Prolonged distal motor latencies, marked uniform and symmetric slowing of conduction velocities, reduced amplitude of distal compound muscle action potentials (CMAP) and sensory nerve action potentials (SNAP) in upper and lower extremities.
Cells, protein, and lactate were normal.

Low right radial nerve compound motor action potential (0.5 mV) with normal NCV; extensive spontaneous activity of the extensor carpi brevis muscle on the right. Prolonged motor and sensory distal latencies and moderate slowing of NCVs in the left median nerve.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient's radial nerve palsy completely recovered in 2 months.

other_tests.findings: Identified deletion in the 17p11.2 region in both mother and son.
